orDiaLine.speaker: PurplePenguin
orDiaLine.text2: My friends said they'd be here. Did they leave without me?

orDiaLine.speaker: GreenGecko
orDiaLine.text1: Surprise! I was hiding in the sand hehe..

orDiaLine.speaker: PurplePenguin
orDiaLine.text1: Nice try buddy.. I've got nerves of steel.

orDiaLine.speaker: GreenGecko
orDiaLine.text1: You're no fun.. Btw, where's Bear? Wasn't she coming with you?

orDiaLine.speaker: BronzeBear
orDiaLine.text2: THIS NEW APP ALLOWS YOU TO TELEPORT ANYWHERE YOU WANT!

orDiaLine.speaker: PurplePenguin
orDiaLine.text1: LET'S USE IT TO GO TO THE MALL!

orDiaLine.speaker: GreenGecko
orDiaLine.text1: Nah, I say let's use it to head to the surf shop..

orDiaLine.speaker: BronzeBear
orDiaLine.text1: How about we enjoy our time here at the beach.
